comment_list.body:
LLM spam detection (✨ experimental): SPAM. The submission is an unsolicited promotional testimonial advertising an external recovery/hacking service with contact details, unrelated to the repository's issues. It contains no actionable bug report, feature request, or development context and appears to be promotional/fraudulent content rather than a legitimate contribution.

♻️ Automatically wiping, closing, and locking for now based on heuristics.
Generally, please focus on creating high-quality, original content that demonstrates a clear
understanding of the project's requirements and goals.
